lst.name: sentence
lst.str: When ministers met on March 30 and 31 in Brussels for initial discussions on the farm price package, several, notably France"s Francois Guillaume and West Germany"s Ignaz Kiechle, said the proposals were unacceptably tough.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But even then, the British are among several delegations which oppose the Commission"s controversial plan to raise two billion European Currency Units through a tax on imported and EC-produced oilseeds and fats.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Their current chairman, Belgium"s Paul de Keersmaeker, promised at the end of the group"s last meeting that if agreement appeared in sight this week, he would keep his colleagues at the negotiating table for long days and nights.

lst.name: sentence
